'''Tatok''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A Naasitaqi dwarf living in [Junvik village](/junvikVillage/), Tatok is the local blacksmith and father to a child who was recently sacrificed to [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourer/). Unwilling to accept this, he has sworn vengeance - in any way possible.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =[Nemnok the Devourer ](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/)
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* With History 3, you can identify the runes he's stamping on the armor as a litany of violent and colourful curses in Naasitaqi.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Nemnok the Devourer ](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/): He asks for your help in saving his son, [Kaali](/kaali/).

[Category:Junvik village characters](/categoryJunvikVillageCharacters/)

'''Tatok''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A Naasitaqi dwarf living in [[Junvik village]], Tatok is the local blacksmith and father to a child who was recently sacrificed to [[Nemnok the Devourer]]. Unwilling to accept this, he has sworn vengeance - in any way possible.
